name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil the spaghetti. Fry the pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine everything.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil the spaghetti. Fry the beef, onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce. Combine everything.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Boil the spaghetti. Fry the garlic and chili flakes. Combine everything.
